flawed_nl_solution:
2000 x 0.25 = <<2000*0.25=500>>500
The loser got 45% of the votes because 100 - 55 = <<100-55=45>>45
The winner got 275 votes because 500 x 0.55 = <<500*0.55=275>>275
The loser got 225 votes because 500 x 0.45 = <<500*0.45=225>>225
The winner got 54 more votes because 275 - 225 = <<275-225=54>>54

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 50, not 54. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
